subject: Password reset not working on mobile
description: User cannot reset password on iOS app.
last_feedback: The response lacks a clear structure and repeats the context unnecessarily. Remove the 'Context' heading and ensure the steps are presented more clearly. Also, add a more empathetic tone to acknowledge the user's frustration.

subject: Admin lost access to 2FA
description: Admin lost authenticator app and needs to reset MFA.
last_feedback: The response lacks specific actionable steps for identity verification required for the 2FA reset. Include clear instructions on how the admin can verify their identity to proceed with the reset.
